issue.title: [C++] Implement ArrayBuilder::Finish in terms of internal::ArrayData
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1488](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1488). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In `arrow::compute` we will frequently be working with unboxed internal array data, so it would be useful for the builders to be able to return the internal data container. This may also simplify some code in arrow/builder.cc
